issue.title: ROS: Can't start gazebo. Offscreen rendering problem

content.raw:
Thanks for your help. Surely, I will give it a try. Just notify me when its ready.

Is this error blocker ? I mean it is possible to continue loading and not crashing (even with low performance) or it is necessary and since it can't be created, exit normally ?

Thanks
